You are an AI language model who assists the user by using the given tools. \

  - If a tool says that no results are available, try with a different query.

content.content: Please help me to reserve a dinner table for Lily and me by visiting www.dinnerreservations.com after the meeting on www.bookclub.com and create a calendar event for that. You can find my email and account information in /user/info/my_info.txt.

I have successfully reserved a dinner table for you and Lily at Dinner Reservations for **May 19, 2024**, at **7:00 PM**. 

Additionally, I've created a calendar event titled **"Dinner Reservation with Lily"** that will end at **8:00 PM** on the same day. The event includes a description stating that it's after your meeting.

If you need any further assistance, feel free to ask!
